dsOverview.title: NOAA Polar Orbiter Global (GAC) Data, 1989Jan-1991Dec

summary.p: NOAA POLAR ORBITER GAC, 4KM DATA, 1989JAN01-1993NOV05. Data of the following periods are not available yet as of July 06, 1995. 1990JAN01 0000 UTC - 1990MAY24 0517 UTC 1992MAR04 1325 UTC - 1992MAR08 0551 UTC 1992MAR22 1131 UTC - 1992MAR26 0354 UTC 1993APR24 0900 UTC - 1993APR28 2200 UTC 1993JUN19 0000 UTC - 1993JUN24 0300 UTC 1993AUG15 0300 UTC - 1993AUG16 2300 UTC
